issue.title: Fix incorrect replacement in markdown image links

labels.name: lgtm/need 2
labels.description: This PR needs two approvals by maintainers to be considered for merging.

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
Fix #26548
When the repo name is `src`:
-  `/<user>/src/src/branch/` => `/<user>/media/src/branch/` 

it should be: 
-  `/<user>/src/src/branch/` => `/<user>/src/media/branch/`

issue.title: Rework markup link rendering

labels.name: backport/manual

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
Fixes #26548

This PR refactors the rendering of markup links. The old code uses `strings.Replace` to change some urls while the new code uses more context to decide which link should be generated.

The added tests should ensure the same output for the old and new behaviour (besides the bug).

We may need to refactor the rendering a bit more to make it clear how the different helper methods render the input string. There are lots of options (resolve links / images / mentions / git hashes / emojis / ...) but you don't really know what helper uses which options. For example, we currently support images in the user description which should not be allowed I think:

<details>
  <summary>Profile</summary> 

https://try.gitea.io/KN4CK3R
 ![grafik](https://github.com/go-gitea/gitea/assets/1666336/109ae422-496d-4200-b52e-b3a528f553e5)

</details>

issue.title: Calling your repo 'src' breaks rendering of relative paths in markdown

labels.name: issue/duplicate
labels.description: The issue has already been reported.

repository.name: gitea
repository.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

issue.body:
### Description

Reproducer Repo: https://try.gitea.io/Orjan/src

As shown, the rendering of _README.md_ is broken - images are not showing up at all and the links themselves are also broken.

Compare this with https://try.gitea.io/aybe/markdown-branch where everything is rendered correctly.

The only difference of the repos I see is their names. Mine is called **_src_**, and this seems to trigger the problem.

Of course I could name my repo differently, but that dosn't address the real issue.

### Gitea Version

1.21.0+dev-651-g60ca3d04a

### Can you reproduce the bug on the Gitea demo site?

Yes

### Log Gist

_No response_

### Screenshots

_No response_

### Git Version

_No response_

### Operating System

_No response_

### How are you running Gitea?

I'm using latest version on https://try.gitea.io.

### Database

None

This PR refactors the rendering of markup links. The old code uses `strings.Replace` to change some urls while the new code uses more context to decide which link should be generated.
